0004: $_3194 = 0

:MDLMAC_48050
8018:   not $_3194 > 100
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48110

83D5:   not has_mission_audio_loaded slot 1@

0002: jump @MDLMAC_48050

:MDLMAC_48075
0001: wait 0
83D7:   not has_mission_audio_finished slot 1@ 
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080  
00DB: if or
8039:   not 0@ == 0 
8019:   not TIMERB > 2700
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080 
00DB: if or
8039:   not 0@ == 14 
8019:   not TIMERB > 1300
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080 
00DB: if or
8039:   not 0@ == 17 
8019:   not TIMERB > 2950
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080           
00DB: if or
8039:   not 0@ == 21 
8019:   not TIMERB > 3250
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080 
00DB: if or
8039:   not 0@ == 27 
8019:   not TIMERB > 3280
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080   
00DB: if or
8039:   not 0@ == 39 
8019:   not TIMERB > 3900
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080  
00DB: if or
8039:   not 0@ == 179 
8019:   not TIMERB > 2900
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080

8039:   not 0@ == 1219 
8019:   not TIMERB > 3500
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48080

8039:   not 0@ == 1254 
8019:   not TIMERB > 2550

8039:   not 0@ == 1384 
8019:   not TIMERB > 2300

0038:   $_3195 == 1

8018:   not $401 > 0

0051: return   

:MDLMAC_48125
020F: lock_car_doors 0@ mode 1
03F8: get_car_colours 0@ store_to 71@ and 72@
00DB: if and
0038:   71@ == 6
0038:   72@ == 61
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48150
02B1: set_car_proofs 0@ BP 1 FP 0 EP 0 CP 0 MP 0
0299: set_can_respray_car 0@ to 0 

:MDLMAC_48150
00DB: if and
0038:   71@ == 70
0038:   72@ == 88

0299: set_can_respray_car 0@ to 0

0038:   71@ == 0
0038:   72@ == 88

0299: set_can_respray_car 0@ to 0

:MDLMAC_48180
0051: return

:MDLMAC_48225

:MDLMAC_48250
0008: $347 += 1
8018:   not $347 > 11
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48260
00DB: if and
80E8:   not locate_player_any_means_2d $PLAYER_CHAR coord 0@ 1@ radius 10.0 10.0 sphere 0
80C2:   not is_point_on_screen 0@ 1@ 2@ radius 5.0
004D: jf @MDLMAC_48275

:MDLMAC_48260 
00C5: return_true

:MDLMAC_48275
00C6: return_false

:MONEY
0110: store_score $PLAYER_CHAR to $_162 // money 
0006: 0@ = 0 
0064: 0@ -= $_162
010E: add_score $PLAYER_CHAR value 0@ // money 
010E: add_score $PLAYER_CHAR value $_161 // money

/*
1) Suit 137.2 -885.7 26.1                                                                        nocost
2) Suit -1149.5 157.9 58.8                                                                       nocost
3) ~h~Leone outfit~w~ delivered to the ZIP clothes shop in Bellevile park. 2.0 -484.9 18.4       cost
4) ~h~Biker suit~w~ delivered to the Pons clothing shop in Bedford Point. 164.4 -1350.3 26.1     cost
5) ~h~Forelli outfit~w~ delivered to the Saint's Mark Bistro. 1326.7 -465.8 49.7                 nocost
6) ~h~Boss outfit~w~ delivered to Mr. Benz clothes shop in Pike Creek. -1114.8 27.4 58.7         cost
7) ~h~Nerd clothes~w~ delivered to the university in Liberty Campus. 176.4 -100.1 20.1           nocost
8) ~h~Hobo clouts~w~ delivered to the subway in Francis International Airport. -709.2 -760.2 -3.5 nocost
9) ~h~Cartels' outfit~w~ delivered to the Cartel's mansion in Cedar Grove. -367.9 248.2 60.8     nocost
10) ~h~Smuggler outfit~w~ delivered to the Contraband pier in Rockford. 143.7 255.8 11.6         nocost
11) ~h~Zombie outfit~w~ delivered to the church in Bedford Point. 17.9 -1124.4 26.1              nocost
12) ~h~Racer suit~w~ delivered to the Capital Autos in Saint Mark's. 1218.7 -122.0 15.0          cost
13) ~h~Army clothes~w~ delivered to the Phil Cassidy's Fully Cocked Gun Shop. 170.7 -1252.8 26.1 nocost
14) ~h~Elephant drip~w~ delivered to the savehouse in Bellevile park. 137.2 -892.8 26.1          nocost
*/

:AMBTAXI
03A9: script_name 'AMBTAXI' 
0006: 15@ = 1 
0006: 0@ = 0 
0007: 7@ = 30.0 
0007: 8@ = 15.0 
0006: 1@ = 0 
0006: 2@ = 0 
0006: 3@ = 0 
0004: $2725 = -1 
0006: 12@ = 0 
0006: 14@ = 0 

:AMBTAXI_57
0001: wait 250 
025B:   is_player_playing $PLAYER_CHAR 
004D: jf @AMBTAXI_149 
0054: get_player_coordinates $PLAYER_CHAR store_to 22@ 23@ 24@ 
0175: get_player_heading $PLAYER_CHAR store_to 26@ 
02E3:   is_player_in_taxi $PLAYER_CHAR 
004D: jf @AMBTAXI_145 
0039:   1@ == 0 
004D: jf @AMBTAXI_131 
0006: 1@ = 1 
0006: 0@ = 7 
0002: jump @AMBTAXI_1593 
0002: jump @AMBTAXI_138 

:AMBTAXI_131
0002: jump @AMBTAXI_57 

:AMBTAXI_138
0002: jump @AMBTAXI_149 

:AMBTAXI_145
0006: 1@ = 0 

:AMBTAXI_149
0038:   $ONMISSION == 1 
004D: jf @AMBTAXI_206 
0039:   3@ == 0

0006: 3@ = 1

:AMBTAXI_192

:AMBTAXI_199

0006: 3@ = 0 

:AMBTAXI_210
825B:   not is_player_playing $PLAYER_CHAR 
004D: jf @AMBTAXI_270 
0039:   2@ == 0 
004D: jf @AMBTAXI_256 
0006: 2@ = 1 
0006: 0@ = 6 
0002: jump @AMBTAXI_1593 
0002: jump @AMBTAXI_263 

:AMBTAXI_256
0002: jump @AMBTAXI_57 

:AMBTAXI_263
0002: jump @AMBTAXI_274 

:AMBTAXI_270
0006: 2@ = 0 

:AMBTAXI_274
0039:   0@ == 0 
004D: jf @AMBTAXI_444 
0006: 12@ = 0 
0007: 30@ = 360.0 
0063: 30@ -= 26@
02FB: sin 30@ store_to 31@ 
02FC: cos 30@ store_to 32@ 
0013: 31@ *= 40.0 
0013: 32@ *= 40.0 
005B: 31@ += 22@
005B: 32@ += 23@

:RC1_73

00DF: store_car_player_is_in $PLAYER_CHAR store_to 3@
065C: switch_emergency_services 0

0038:   $_241 == 0
004D: jf @RC1_80

0002: jump @RC1_85

:RC1_80

:RC1_85

0001: wait 250
0006: TIMERA = 0
01EA: print_with_number_now 'RCBLAP' number 18 time 6500 flag 1 // Destroy ~g~green~w~ Mafia Sentinel to get 2 score points or ~y~yellow~w~ one to get 1 score point. Mission will fail if you destroy a ~r~red~w~ car.
00BD: print_soon 'RCBLAP1' time 6500 flag 1// Cars randomly change their color each 5 seconds. Score at least 15 points in 2 minutes to pass the mission.

:RC1_90

0019:   TIMERA > 6500
